Nightshift heads back to follow Dark Rodimus but does so carefully and quie=
tly.  

" don't you worry, we got this."

Perpetually on the move and const=
antly busy. 

On Aug 15, 2011, at 12:16 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@=
hotmail.com> wrote:

> Elita:
>  
> =E2=80=9CIf my dad needs me then I have=
 to go where he is=E2=80=9Dsaid Elita while tears continued falling
>  
>  =

> From: Sandy Panico
> Sent: Sunday, August 14, 2011 10:39 PM
> To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: Strange meetings - new friends & old enemie=
s
>  
> 
> 
> Straight Shot puts an arm around Elita.
>  
> " don't you wor=
ry, if Uncle Tucson could save him before, he can do it again.  And so can =
we.  He taught us how to look inside our inner warrior and find strength, t=
enacity, courage and determination.  But he also taught us that we can over=
come any obstacle if we put our minds to it.  You seem very determined ta g=
o out there with us and ya know what? That's what your dad needs more than =
anything else.  He needs us but he REALLY needs you.  So let's do this toge=
ther, all three of us.  Let's show whoever has your dad that we mean busine=
ss."
>  
> Nightshift flashes his highbeams.
>  
> " I second that, look ou=
t world 'cause here we come!"
> 
> 
> Perpetually on the move and constantl=
y busy.
>

e in the 
>> passengers seat.

know why. But we'll do our best to 
>> save him.... Again."
>> 
>> Nightshi=
ft comments.
>> 
>> " Slag he better invest in some serious anti hack'n sof=
tware after this 
>> time."
>>

d scans the ground.
>> 
>> " Noctorro, are we getting close to the Fuzors l=
ocation?"

<div>Straight Shot puts an arm around Eli=
ta.</div>
<div> </div>
<div>" don't you worry, if Uncle Tucson could s=
ave him before, he can do it 
again.  And so can we.  He taught u=
s how to look inside our inner 
warrior and find strength, tenacity, courag=
e and determination.  But he 
also taught us that we can overcome any =
obstacle if we put our minds to 
it.  You seem very determined ta go o=
ut there with us and ya know what? 
That's what your dad needs more than an=
ything else.  He needs us but he 
REALLY needs you.  So let's do =
this together, all three of us.  Let's 
show whoever has your dad that=
 we mean business."</div>
<div> </div>
<div>Nightshift flashes his hig=
hbeams.</div>
<div> </div>

 here we come!"</div>
